text: I want to use the Hub DB row field to get a dynamic page from a table, but the sorting label doesn’t let me choose hs_name, only meta description or other columns which aren’t very easy to understand, does anyone know why this is the case?
You also can’t use the link or URL field to link to these pages unless you use external, however I want to pull information from the table out so this isn’t much use either
